sentences.en: a vastly superior (= very much better, stronger etc ) army
sentences.cn: 一支强大得多的军队

sentences.en: Don’t you usually salute a superior officer ?
sentences.cn: 你难道平时不向上级军官敬礼的吗？

sentences.en: Finch gave a superior smile.
sentences.cn: 芬奇高傲地笑了笑。

sentences.en: Fletcher’s superior technique brought him victory.
sentences.cn: 弗莱彻更胜一筹的技术使他取得了胜利。

sentences.en: He had a good working relationship with his immediate superior (= the person directly above him ) .
sentences.cn: 他和他的顶头上司工作关系很融洽。

sentences.en: He loves making fun of women. It makes him feel superior .
sentences.cn: 他喜欢取笑女人，这样让他感觉高她们一等。

sentences.en: His immediate superior has singled him out for a special mention.
sentences.cn: 他的顶头上司特别提到了他。

sentences.en: His immediate superior, General Geichenko, had singled him out for special mention.
sentences.cn: 他的直接上级盖琴科将军特别提到了他。

sentences.en: His men were far superior numerically.
sentences.cn: 他手下的士兵在人数上占了绝对优势。

sentences.en: I want to reiterate that our conventional weapons are superior.
sentences.cn: 我要再次重申，我们的常规武器是一流的。

sentences.en: Long-term stock market investments have produced superior returns compared with cash deposits.
sentences.cn: 股票市场长期投资的收益比现金存款要高。

sentences.en: Our superior technology is our ace in the hole.
sentences.cn: 我们超众的技术是我们的法宝。

sentences.en: People make cutting remarks to help themselves feel superior or powerful.
sentences.cn: 人们说话尖酸刻薄是为了使自己感觉高高在上或是有权有势。

sentences.en: She had that superior tone of voice.
sentences.cn: 她带着那种傲慢的语气。

sentences.en: Soldiers act in obedience to the orders of their superior officers.
sentences.cn: 士兵们遵照上级军官的命令行动.

sentences.en: The Colonel lifted the phone and dialed his superior.
sentences.cn: 上校拿起电话，拨通了上司的号码。

sentences.en: The company president, and my immediate superior, was the dynamic Harry Stokes.
sentences.cn: 公司的董事长，也就是我的直接上司，是精力充沛的哈里·斯托克斯。

sentences.en: They were tactically superior too.
sentences.cn: 他们在战术上也占据优势。

sentences.en: Through superior production techniques they were able to gain the competitive edge.
sentences.cn: 凭借先进的生产技术，他们得以占据竞争优势。

sentences.en: Time has winnowed out certain of the essays as superior.
sentences.cn: 历经岁月淘洗，某些文章终成经典。

sentences.en: vastly superior
sentences.cn: 强得多

sentences.en: We have a relationship infinitely superior to those of many of our friends.
sentences.cn: 我们之间的关系远比我们许多朋友之间的关系好得多。

words.tran_cn: 上级，长官；优胜者，高手；长者

trans.tran_cn: 比…好的，优良的，更高级的，傲慢的，居多的
trans.tran_en: thinking that you are better than other people – used to show disapproval
someone who has a higher rank or position than you, especially in a job
